sections.paragraph: + The son of Elishama, and father of Ishmael who murdered Gedaliah. (2 Kings 25:23,25) He was of the royal family of Judah. (B.C. 620.) + One of the four sons of Asaph the minstrel. (1 Chronicles 25:12) (B.C. 1015.) + A Levite in the reign of Jehoshaphat. (2 Chronicles 17:8) (B.C. 912.) + The father of Jehudi. (Jeremiah 36:14) (B.C. 638.)
